job.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtAn AI engineering company that creates software solutions that go beyond conventional AI is looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join their teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThis Jobot Job is hosted by Matt MahoneyltbrgtltbrgtAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumeltbrgtltbrgtSalary 170000  225000 per yearltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtA Bit About UsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThis is a wellfunded computer software company that was founded in 2014 and raised a 133M Series C last year They are an AIML focused startup servicing the Energy Healthcare and Finance sectors by building industrial AI MVPs and POCs for larger corporations They are looking for a Senior ML Engineer to build modern ML models for their products and work with their software team to deploy and maintain the models in productionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligt Very competitive Base Salaryltligtltligt Equityltligtltligt Yearly Bonusltligtltligt Generous PTOltligtltligt Full Healthcare Coverage Medical Dental Visionltligtltligt This is an opportunity to join a wellfunded and growing Computer Software startupltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtJob DetailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe ideal candidate has experience withltbrgtltulgtltligt Pythonltligtltligt Tensorflowltligtltligt PyTorchltligtltligt Kerasltligtltligt Sparkltligtltligt AWS or Azure plusltligtltligt Cubflow or MLflow plusltbrgtltligtltulgtInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button
